name: Kiryuin Satsuki (Kill La Kill) LoRA
description:
This is a LoRA to generate Kiryuin Satsuki from Kill La Kill.

  • I suggest using this LoRA at 0.7-1.0 weight for best results.

  • These images were generated and only tested using AOM2, AOM3 A1, Corneo's 7th Heaven Mix, My Own Mix with the OrangeMix VAE and AnythingV3 VAE. (I'm lazy.)

  • Always add this to the prompt to activate it - kiryuin satsuki

  • She can be placed in any clothes but if you wish to put her in traditional clothes: junketsu, epaulettes, school uniform, skirt, white thigh boots

  • If you wish to place her in Junketsu: junketsu, revealing clothes, clothing cutout, cleavage cutout, white panties, white thighhighs

  • It can do portraits, upper body and cowboy shot pretty well at 512x512

  • I suggest generating at 768x768 for higher quality pictures. It's also suggested using this resolution for full body.

  • You can add weapon, sword to prompt if you want to generate her sword - It doesn't always come out good.

All pictures were upscaled using these settings:

  • Upscaler: Fatal-Anime 4x

  • Hires. Steps: 25

  • Denoising Strength: 0.5

  • Upscale by 1.5

Known Issues

  • It struggles with full body @ 512x512 but you can fix this but either upscaling or just generated at 768x768.

  • Sometimes when you're putting her in other clothes that aren't her school uniform or Junketsu - It will make her collar regardless. You can stop this by adding Detached Collar in negative prompt.

  • Sometimes It will generate very faded blue eyes that It looks grey - This is because of like three pictures in the dataset, I believe.

Embeds and LoRAs used

Bad Prompt - Ekune Style LoRA

Follow me on Twitter for updates- https://twitter.com/TrueHeroBang

Everything I'm making will always be free but if you want to show a little bit more support, you can buy me a coffee - https://ko-fi.com/ekune
